events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the package has not arrived yet. The tracking number shows no updates.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's message about late shipping and tracking concerns.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah W. for handling the delayed shipment inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your frustration with the delayed package, and Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please confirm your order number and the shipping address so I can investigate the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 West Park Road, Springfield.
Thank you for the information. I contacted the carrier and the package is delayed due to unforeseen weather. It should arrive within the next 3 business days.
I understand the delay is out of your control, but I hope it arrives soon. Thanks for your update.
We will monitor your delivery status and keep you informed. Please reach out if there are any further issues. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm your package has arrived safely. If you need any more help, please let us know.
Since we have not heard any further concerns, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
